Pre-Game Insights: Denmark will look to build on a 2-0 win over Switzerland when they take on Serbia in a highly-anticipated UEFA Nations League game.
Lecce defender Patrick Dorgu is pushing for a rare start after scoring the opener against Switzerland.

The Serbs did remarkably well to hold star-studded Spain to a goalless draw in their opener despite the absence of key players like Dusan Tadic, Sergej Milinkovic-Savic, Aleksandar Mitrovic, and Dusan Vlahovic.
Dragan Stojkovic is unlikely to make changes to the team that faced Spain in Belgrade.
